content: 6 6 6 8 8 8 8 10 10 10 sts k to bor you will now have 140 158 176 192 208 226 242 260 276 294 310 sts on the needles for the body k body for 7 inches from underarm or to desired length bobble loosely in k sleeves choose which arm you would like to do first and place one set of sts that were on hold back on the needles do not remove the markers that are in the sleeve sts starting on the right hand side of the underarm pu and k 4 4 4 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 6 sts place marker to denote bor then pu and k 4 4 4 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 6 sts k1 sm k to marker rm k2tog k to bor k3 ssk rm k to bor k sleeves in stockinette until you are 3 inches from underarm for short sleeves 18 inches for long sleeves or until desired length bobble loosely in k pattern copyright © lacey williamson 2023 6 | p a ge weave in ends block and wear proudly tag your finished garments with #badideablouse and #windwoodfarmknits so everyone can see your beautiful knits follow me on instagram @windwoodfarmknits to see upcoming designs current projects and more on my design process please enjoy this pattern but do not reproduce the pattern or commercially manufacture the project made from it this pattern may not be shared or distributed electronically or physically without permission from © lacey williamson 2023 pattern copyright © lacey williamson 2023
